name: purduecircle
description: Social Network to connect Purdue students. Built for the CS307

scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && node app.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.init: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
